title: SHECANCODE Graduation
description: We graduated 23 Female computer programmers today. We thank @USAmbRwandafor the partnership. Looking forward to bringing more women in #STEM

title: Partnership  of israel
description: On February 28th, 2022, The Ambassador of Israel to Rwanda, Dr. Ron Adam signed a MoU with the CEO and Co-Founder of Igire Rwanda Organization, Mr. JeanJacques Iradukunda to pave the way for the Embassy of Israel in Rwanda to fund the 6th Cohort of the SheCanCode Program, to advance its work of empowering young women and girls in Rwanda in coding, digital and professional skills. Igire Rwanda Organisation and the SheCanCode Program are delighted to have this support and look forward to a continued collaboration with the Israel Embassy in Rwanda to bring more girls and women in STEM

title: Awe Graduation
description: Our team is ready for the retreat with to learn from the past cohorts & get ready for #Cohort3! We're glad to develop many Noble Women. Looking forward to empowering more women entrepreneurs in #Rwanda @USAmbRwanda@AmbRonAdam@umulisa_jede@igirerwandaorg@RwandaGender
